fields.Title of Presentation: Acquiring Resources to Strengthen a Position or Change Directions
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Institute of Strategic and International Studies (ISIS) Conference
fields.Description/Abstract: Merger and acquisition activity is growing. However, reasons for this activity are still unclear. This paper investigates this using the resource-based view. We argue that high performing businesses are more likely to buy similar targets to strengthen their positions, whereas low performing business are more likely to buy dissimilar targets to seek different resources to change directions. The results supported our hypotheses.
